content: FYI, I opened a question on possible efforts to harmonize the FHIR profiling efforts between Nordic countries in https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179267-Sweden-on.20FHIR/topic/Nordic.20cooperation/near/158547356

Hi, thanks @Mikael Rinnetmäki ! Co-operation between Nordic countries is welcome. In Finland, we have been active to participate international HL7 FHIR DevDays. Coming summer brings HIMSS Europe to Helsinki. Maybe we will meet there #denmark #norway #Sweden on FHIR ?
What's the dates for HIMSS? #denmark here
Clashes with FHIR DevDays :-( (else I might have tried to come...)
@Grahame Grieve is there a time before the FHIR DevDays that would be possible for you?
maybe. Someone else has a lock on the 2 days before DevDays June, but it's not confirmed yet.
How about if we organize something in Finland or Sweden on the week of June 3-7?
it's ... possible. maybe for one day? But we did talk about after DevDays amsterdam?
Yes, that's a separate event, more focused on activities in Finland. have you received a formal invite for that one already?
Hi all, please see the latest discussion at https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179267-Sweden-on.20FHIR/topic/Nordic.20cooperation/near/160544232

We agreed to organize a monthly call to synchronize the activities between the Nordic countries. Each first Wednesday of the month, at 9-10 CET, 10-11 Finnish time.
If you're interested in participating, please contact @Espen Stranger Seland who will host the call.
